Module com.bankinggui
Package com.bankinggui

Class TransactionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.bankinggui.TransactionManagerController
public class TransactionManagerController extends Object
This is the controller class of the Transaction Manager. This class contains the event handlers
Author:
Jia Wern Chong, Frances Cortuna

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes application by connecting buttons and UI with event handlers

    • toggleDisable

      private void toggleDisable()
      This method allows user to choose only one account type

    • handlePaneSwitch

      private void handlePaneSwitch(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Changes the active pane variable when pane is switched
      Parameters:
      event - When a new pane is clicked

    • checkFields

      private boolean checkFields(String firstName, String lastName, LocalDate dateOfBirth)
      Checks if all the appropriate fields are filled in or selected.
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name from input
      lastName - Last name from input
      dateOfBirth - Date of birth from input
      Returns:
      True if all fields are filled in, false otherwise

    • handleOpenButton

      private void handleOpenButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event Handler for the open button Get the data required to add account from user input
      Parameters:
      event - Event that triggers this handler

    • handleCloseButton

      private void handleCloseButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event Handler for the close button Get the data required to close account from user input
      Parameters:
      event - Event that triggers this handler

    • handleClearButton

      private void handleClearButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to clear user input for the clear button in Open/Close tab

    • openAccount

      private void openAccount(Account account)
      Opens a new account
      Parameters:
      account - New account object to open

    • closeAccount

      private void closeAccount(Profile profile, String accountTypeInitial)
      Closes an account. Throws an exception if account is not in database.
      Parameters:
      profile - Profile of account to close
      accountTypeInitial - The initial of the account type

    • parseChecking

      private void parseChecking(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String action)
      Parses input data into a Checking object Also checks to make sure all data is valid.

    • parseCollegeChecking

      private void parseCollegeChecking(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String campus, String action)
      Opens college checking account with input data. Also checks to make sure all data is valid.

    • parseCampusCode

      private Campus parseCampusCode(String campus)
      Takes campus selection and returns appropriate Campus object
      Parameters:
      campus - Campus selection

    • parseSavings

      private void parseSavings(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String action)
      Opens savings account with input data. Also checks to make sure all data is valid.

    • parseMoneyMarket

      private void parseMoneyMarket(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String action)
      Opens money market savings account with input data. Also checks to make sure all data is valid.

    • checkDOB

      private boolean checkDOB(Date dob, String accType)
      Checks that DOB is a valid past date and that profile in at least 16 years old. If account type is CC, also checks that profile is under 24 years old. Returns true if DOB is valid and profile is old enough and returns false otherwise
      Parameters:
      dob - DOB of profile
      Returns:
      True if DOB and age is valid, false otherwise.

    • checkDuplicateProfile

      private boolean checkDuplicateProfile(Account account)
      Checks if new profile matches existing profile in account database. Also checks if a person opening a Checking or College Checking does not already have another Checking or College Checking account.
      Parameters:
      account - New profile being made
      Returns:
      True if account is not already in account database, false otherwise.

    • handleDepositWithdrawButton

      private void handleDepositWithdrawButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parses user input for deposit.
      Parameters:
      event - Clicking deposit button

    • checkAmount

      private boolean checkAmount(String balance, String action)
      Checks deposit or withdrawal amount to ensure it is a valid amount.
      Parameters:
      balance - Amount to be deposited or withdrawn
      action - Deposit or withdraw
      Returns:
      True if amount is valid, false otherwise.

    • depositMoney

      private void depositMoney(Account account, String accountTypeInitial)
      Deposits money into an account. Throws an exception if account is not in database.
      Parameters:
      account - Account to deposit money into
      accountTypeInitial - Type of account in initial form.

    • withdrawMoney

      private void withdrawMoney(Account account, String accountTypeInitial)
      Withdraw money into an account. Throws an exception if account is not in database or if there is insufficient funds.
      Parameters:
      account - Account to withdraw money from
      accountTypeInitial - Type of account in initial form.

    • handleDisplayButton

      private void handleDisplayButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Displays all accounts sorted by account types.

    • handleLoadAccButton

      private void handleLoadAccButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event Handler for the Load Accounts from a File button Read file to get the information of the accounts before adding the account to Account Database.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • addCheckingLoad

      private void addCheckingLoad(StringTokenizer input)
      Add Checking to Account Database from read file Only called at loadAcc()
      Parameters:
      input - The data token to add Checking

    • addCollegeCheckingLoad

      private void addCollegeCheckingLoad(StringTokenizer input)
      Add College Checking to Account Database from read file Only called at loadAcc()
      Parameters:
      input - The data token to add College Checking

    • parseLoyaltyStatus

      private boolean parseLoyaltyStatus(int loyaltyStatusCode)
      Parses integer to return boolean for loyalty status
      Parameters:
      loyaltyStatusCode - Loyalty status code from input
      Returns:
      Appropriate boolean for loyalty status

    • addSavingsLoad

      private void addSavingsLoad(StringTokenizer input)
      Add Savings to Account Database from read file Only called at loadAcc()
      Parameters:
      input - The data token to add Savings

    • addMoneyMarketLoad

      private void addMoneyMarketLoad(StringTokenizer input)
      Add Money Market to Account Database from read file Only called at loadAcc()
      Parameters:
      input - The data token to add Money Market

    • handleDisplayFeesInterestButton

      private void handleDisplayFeesInterestButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Displays all accounts sorted by account type with calculated fees and monthly interests.

    • handleUpdateAccountsButton

      private void handleUpdateAccountsButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Applies fees and monthly interests to accounts. Then prints accounts sorted by account type.
